name: Glow (itch) (TheChineseGuy, Sebpt, Seany G, Konstantin Labin)
name_original: Glow (itch) (TheChineseGuy, Sebpt, Seany G, Konstantin Labin)
description: The endless scroller game where you munch on fireflies and avoid the birds! Made for Zeno Jam 5 with the theme - Light Attracts Bugs. Made by Kar Wah, Seb, seanyg22 and kon5tamar
